description.en:
Collection of short stories:

[*] Hajimete, Kudasai.

[*] Idol-sama no Okiniiri
Niina is a 3rd rate performer in a school for idols. One day, with all her luck, she manages to hurt the arm of the top of the top idols - Takashiro Asuka. Will her life come to an abrubt end after this mistake, or will it...? (From: Shoujo Love)

[*] Ano Natsu Kara Zutto.
"While I went to a certain course, the summer of my third year, by chance I saw the baseball field. And while watching you try to hit the ball, you caught my heart."
"One year later, I've found you again..."

[*] Gouriki Ikka no Owarinaki Tousou

[*] Kimi no Tonari de Natsumatsuri

[*] Kimi no Kokoro ni Kaoridzuke
